name: Kaiser Permanente Hospital - San Francisco
description: Kaiser Permanente has been providing health care in San Francisco and its surrounding areas since 1954. They are committed to serving the city’s diverse population, with Spanish- and Chinese-language care teams as well as interpreter services in several languages — including American Sign Language — all at no extra cost to our members. For COVID-19 information and visitor policy at Kaiser Permanente in San Francisco, see https://thrive.kaiserpermanente.org/care-near-you/northern-california/sanfr
